name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.

name: Wall of Flames
description: Wall of concentrated flames acts as a barrier to incoming attacks and destroy all in it way.

name: Air Bomb
description: Hard landings to completely decimate his surroundings after a lengthy fall.

name: Fire Bursts
description: Burst of flames to burn everything in front of it.

name: Fire Missiles
description: Shooting large missiles of flame that could home in on their opponent. These missiles can chase an opponent.

name: Ice Spears
description: Throwing countless ice spears were as sharp as knives.

name: Lightning
description: The bolt of lightning fired by a Firebender travels so fast that it's not easy to avoid.

name: Rock Bullets
description: Compressed a rock into bullets that he launched so fast that managed to decimate the battlefield.

name: Throwing rock
description: Levitating rocks and punching or kicking them toward a target.

name: Tidal Wave
description: Create a  massive tidal waves that was powerful to push their opponent
